comment.body: We **really** need a page like this as a readme or something. There seems to be another influx of new users (from Hacker News and TorrentFreak, it seems), and I've seen people asking if there's a search engine every few hours or so.

Neat! one issue though: In discover mode, there's no indication that the tags are clickable (they look like plain text), and the checkbox for discover mode is unlabeled. Just some cosmetic issues to consider.

> [kaffie](#comment_5_1NWh3WAty57FH8at1WtrZigMrdhrDkuPzh): Yea, I wasn't sure what the best way of displaying all this is, so I just did a write up here on this blog. Making each term a visible blue link, and having text next to the checkbox would be incredibly clunky. As it is now, it's clean, even if it's a not exactly clear and user-friendly.

If I can make a suggestion: maybe bolding and/or underlining tags only when hovering over them?
